description:
Be a gravity ninja. Between one and four players run with scissors, walk on walls, and lob ink bombs in whimsical-yet-intense battles within the pages of old storybooks.

*A variety of game modes including Classic Versus, Gravity Ball, and Capture the Quill
*Coop campaign for one or two players
*Play as a variety of characters from old books or as cameo characters from popular indie games
name: Paperbound Brawlers
